p:
Cell cycle distributions in HepG2 cells were examined through PI staining and analysed by flow cytometry after treatment with spirooxindole 6a at its IC 50 (6.9 µM), as reported earlier
30
,
31 . The samples were analysed by a flow cytometer (BectonDickinson FACSCalibur, BD, USA) and data were analysed using the CellQuest software (Becton Dickinson).
